means: 单孔目哺乳动物，针鼹鼠

sentence.Network_en: One of the mascots for the 2000 Olympics, in Australia, is the echidna.
sentence.Network_cn: 2000年澳大利亚奥运会吉祥物之一是针鼹鼠.

the world's only monotremes are the platypus and the echidna .鸭嘴兽和针鼹鼠是世界上唯一的单孔类动物。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek ekhidna 'viper', also the name of a mythical creature which gave birth to the many-headed Hydra; compare with ekhinos 'sea-urchin, hedgehog'

means.word_mean: 2. burrowing spine-covered monotreme of Australia having a long snout and claws for hunting ants and termites

auth_sentence.content: Only two kinds of egg-laying mammals are left on the planet today the duck-billed platypus and the echidna, or spiny anteater.
